title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: In a workspace with many projects, when exporting a zip file, the updating of checkboxes should use a busy cursor.
OB: When updating checkboxes during the export of a zip file, the cursor does not change to a busy cursor.
EB: When updating checkboxes during the export of a zip file, the cursor should change to a busy cursor to indicate that the operation is in progress.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Navigate to the export Zip feature.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose file types and make some selections.
5. Press the ok button and observe the cursor during the updating process.
